attributes.action: encourage the compulsory tuition of Classics in all state schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The teaching of Latin and/or Greek is a fundamental component of literary and cultural appreciation, and the sharp downturn in the popularity of Classics ought to be reversed; to the benefit of all those in secondary education. The study of at least one of these subjects for a year or more should therefore be made compulsory.
